name: TRAFFIC CHAOS RACING GAME
description:
Demo of Traffic Chaos Racing Game Mobile

Drive your car at full speed in this high intensity racing game for mobile.

As you earn points, you can unlock new cars and accessories to customize your vehicle. In addition, the game includes an Arena mode and an Online mode in which you can compete against your friends, and face players from all over the world. Show your driving skills and become the best driver in the game!
